downloaded and it's just great! thanks for sharing!

@taz.uk
Movies are rarely shot in a 16:9 aspect ratio, it may not have 1080 vertical lines but it's still 1920 horizontally. The 720p version would be no different in this respect as they would have to reduce the vertical resolution anyway to maintain the aspect ratio.
Thank you so much for sharing this and for uploading it as one big file. Unlike the user called master, I hate rar files. There's usually some kind of problem with them.

Hey uploader are you sure this is the unrated version? Seems to me it has the same lenght as the original cut. The Director's Cut however is 10 minutes longer (118 min.).....I don't think there is an unrated version at all. Well I'm just saying that your info and title doesn't add up.

Anyway thanks for uploadin.
